roleset.name: to protect from impact

example.name: cushion for
example.text: Denizens of London 's financial district are cushioning themselves for heavy blows .

example.name: cushion from
example.text: For instance , the new U.S. package makes clear [0] there would be a transition period during which GATT members could use a combination of tariffs and quotas [*] to cushion their farmers from foreign competition [*T*-2] .

example.name: cushion against
example.text: But its competitors -- including Dow Chemical Co. , Union Carbide Corp. and several oil giants -- have much broader business interests and so are better cushioned [*]against price swings .
example.arg: its competitors -- including Dow Chemical Co. , Union Carbide Corp. and several oil giants --

roleset.note: CUSHION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cushion' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from cushion.01-v predicate notes)
